name: Monkey Land 3D: Reaper Rush
description: Monkey Land 3D: Reaper Rush is 100% full of gameplay! There's bananas, treasure coins, Piggys in need of saving, locked treasure chests and thats just in the first 10 seconds! Find new abilities like the butt-stompy by finding the precious Dinosaur Feathers!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: You are recommended to play with a controller.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 980 GTX DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: You are recommended to play with a controller.
